hymn.title: Feed on His faithfulness, my soul
hymn.category: Encouragement—For Feeding on the Lord's Faithfulness

lyrics.stanza: Feed on His faithfulness, my soul, Who chose thee for His own, Who bears thy name in Love's pure flame Before the heav'nly throne; Lay at His feet thy fear, Thy burdens, thy distress, Prostrate embrace thy Fount of Grace— Feed on His faithfulness.

Feed on His faithfulness, my soul, Who suffered Calvary, Who Victor rose o'er all thy foes, Who lives, who prays, for thee! Not thine the battle is, Though close the conflict press: 'Tis His alone who wears the crown— Feed on His faithfulness.
